post_title: FS:Joss OM Walsh EPDG Huggins Marquard Ames
post_content:
I have the following five cards available. Please message me if you have any questions or would like to purchase. I prefer Paypal ff. 
Thanks for looking, Robert

These cards are cross posted . 

PSA 3.5 Addie Joss Old Mill $1400 - PSA must have graded this one with their eyes closed. Multiple surface scuffs. Pop 1 with 1 higher, but it should be a 2 or 2.5 at best.

PSA 2 Ed Walsh EPDG $1300 - Could be viewed as over graded with the rounded corners and crease in upper front left.

PSA 3 Rube Marquard Tolstoi Sold - Pop 2, None higher, total pop 5.

PSA 3 Miller Huggins American Beauty $900 - Pop 2, total pop 9.

PSA 2 Red Ames Hindu Sold - Note crease/wrinkle on top center of card. Pop 2, total pop 10.
